template.name: filesystem
template.longdesc: Create a single primitive resource of type Filesystem.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for this filesystem resource in the cluster.

parameter.name: device
parameter.longdesc: Block device path for the filesystem, e.g.: /dev/disk/by-id/scsi-foo-part1

parameter.name: directory
parameter.longdesc: The mount point for the filesystem, e.g.: /clusterfs

parameter.name: fstype
parameter.longdesc: The type of filesystem, e.g.: btrfs, xfs, ocfs2, ...

parameter.name: options
parameter.longdesc: Any additional options to be given as -o options to the mount command.

template.crm_script:
primitive ocf:heartbeat:Filesystem params device="" directory="" fstype=""
options=""
op start timeout="60" op stop timeout="60" op monitor interval="20" timeout="40"
